subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. previously won the race in 2004. During a delay of more than six hours, a TV replay of last year’s race led many viewers to believe Jimmie Johnson had won.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. previously won the race in 2004. During a delay of more than six hours, a TV replay of last year’s race led many viewers to believe Jimmie Johnson had won.
